privacy.title: Privacy Policy
privacy.data_collection: We collect basic contact information when you submit applications through our website. This includes your name, phone number, email address, and any additional information you provide in application forms.
privacy.data_usage: Your personal data is used exclusively to provide educational consultation services and to contact you regarding Turkish university applications. We do not share your information with third parties without your consent.
privacy.contact: For any questions regarding our privacy policy or data handling practices, please contact us at edu.turkish2018{'@'}gmail.com or through our official social media channels.
